description: For Connor Maguire, it's just another day in the forest... same as any other. He wakes up, showers, packs his lunch, grabs his axe and heads out for his day amongst the trees. As he breaks on a stump eating his sandwich, he sees a lost hiker, and though the hiker is unaware, this is his lucky day. Connor senses his preoccupation and asserts himself, and the next thing Andy knows, he's down on his knees with Connor's trunk of a dick shoved down his throat. Connor returns the favor, throwing Andy onto the ground and stripping him of all his clothes, before flipping him over and sliding his cock inside, pounding Andy as he bites his lip in pleasure. Connor grabs Andy by his shoulders and pulls him closer, all the while hammering him from behind, before blasting him with a working man's load that gushes and spills all over Andy's waiting stomach, as he does the same, vowing to come back if he ever gets a hankering for some more wood. Enjoy!
title: Lumberjacked
